name: Cookies
ingredient: 225g Butter-Softened, 110g caster sugar, 275g plain flour, cinnamon and other spices , 75g chocolate chip
catchPhrase: “Cookies in the morning, and cookies late at night. Cookies all day, here take another bite!”

name: chocolate Cold Coffee
ingredient: instant coffee 1.5 tablespoons, ¼ cup Water, 4 tablespoons sugar, milk, 2 vanilla ice cream scoops vanilla ice Cream, ice
catchPhrase: “That’s a really sweet service you're providing, my fellow iced coffee lover. It’s about time that you put your phone down, sipped on your drink, and let someone help you out instead.”

name: Oreo Cake
ingredient: 12 Oreo cookies , 1 teaspoon powdered sugar, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1 cup milk, 4 eggs
catchPhrase: “Decided that any type of Oreo that is not double stuffed is not worth my time.”

name: Strawberry & Black Current Pastries
ingredient: 2 cups unsalted butter, softened, ⅔ cup all-purpose flour, 8 cups all-purpose flour, divided, 4 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast, ½ cups milk, ½ cup white sugar, 2 teaspoons salt, 2 large eggs, 1 teaspoon lemon extract, 1 teaspoon almond extract, 2 cups fruit preserves, any flavor, 1 large egg white, beaten, Strawberry, blackcurrant.
catchPhrase: “You can handle ANYthing as long as you take it one cake at a time.”
